title: Learning Reports
subtitle: Reflect on your completed tasks to strengthen your learning process.

empty.title: No reports available
empty.description: Complete tasks and create self-evaluations to see your learning reports here.

fields.whatWereYouTryingToGetBetterAt: What were you trying to get better at?
fields.whatWereYouTryingToGetBetterAtHelper: What did you intend to learn? (max 800 characters)
fields.whatWorkedWellThisTimePlaceholder: What aspects of your learning went well?
fields.whatWouldYouDoDifferently: What would you do differently next time? *
fields.whatWouldYouDoDifferentlyPlaceholder: How do you plan to improve next time?
fields.knowledgeConnection: I was able to connect this knowledge with previous learning

validation.learningIntentionRequired: What were you trying to get better at? is required
validation.learningIntentionMaxLength: What were you trying to get better at? must be 800 characters or less
validation.whatWentWellRequired: What worked well this time? is required
validation.whatWentWellMaxLength: What worked well this time? must be 2000 characters or less
validation.challengesEncounteredMaxLength: What was difficult? must be 2000 characters or less
validation.improvementPlanRequired: What would you do differently next time? is required
validation.improvementPlanMaxLength: What would you do differently next time? must be 2000 characters or less
validation.concentrationLevelRange: Concentration level must be between 1 and 10
